options.name: Minor Planar Magic
options.description: You learn 4 Beginner Spells from the Fey school of magic.

options.name: Prankster
options.description: The Fey culture has given you an appreciation for tricks. Gain +1 Thievery and +1 Spell Damage.

options.name: Free Action : Names
options.description: You speak the true name of a humanoid you can see within 10 units. For the next minute, the target has a 1d4 penalty to the next Resistance Check they make against you.

options.name: Protection of the Glade
options.description: You Gain +1 Resistance, +1 Arcane Mitigation and learn the Sylvan Language

options.name: Feymind
options.description: Your mind is protected from the trickery of others. Gain +2 Psychic and Immunity to the Charmed Condition.

options.name: Siren's Song
options.description: Learn a Magical Ballad and gain +1 Performance. If you don't already have it, you gain the ability to play Ballads which require an Action to start and your Focus to maintain which can affect anyone within 4 Units who can hear.

options.name: Lesser Planar Magic
options.description: You learn 4 Novice Spells from the Fey school of magic.

options.name: Action [Daily] : Sprite Form
options.description: You transform into either a Sprite or Pixie, taking on their statblock, but retaining your Knowledge and Social skills. This transformation lasts until you willfully end it or you reach 0 Health, at which point you transform back into your original form.

options.name: Reaction : Feyshift
options.description: As a Reaction to being the target of an Attack, you attempt to avoid it by shifting briefly into the Feywild, gaining a 2d4 bonus to your Defense Check. This ability only works on the Material Plane.

options.name: Planar Magic
options.description: You learn 4 Journeyman Spells from the Fey school of magic.

options.name: Action : Fey Dust
options.description: You sprinkle fey dust on a creature, granting them flight for the next minute.

options.name: Free Action : Dreamweaver
options.description: The next Melee or Ranged Attack you make this turn deals Psychic Damage instead of it's normal Primary type. If the damage brings a creature to 0 Health and it is not immune to the sleeping condition, it gains the sleeping condition for 1 hour.

options.name: Greater Planar Magic
options.description: You learn 4 Expert Spells from the Fey school of magic. At level 10, learn 2 Master Spells from the Fey school of magic. Additionally, gain +1 Spell Attack and +1 Spell Damage.

options.name: Action [Daily] : Charm
options.description: Using your innate Fey magic, you attempt to charm a Creature that you can see within 10 units by making a Performance Check against their Resistance. On a success, the creature is charmed by you for an hour or until it breaks naturally. On a failure, the creature is not aware of your attempt.

options.name: Fey
options.description: You have the Fey creature type, as well as the humanoid type. Your fey lineage also has physical implications, changing your appearance in a minor or drastic way.
